help.title: Help - Mob Name
help.description: This option allows you to customize the name of the mob you will summon. The name you write here will be visible floating above the mob when you summon it in the game.

help.title: Help - Mob Amount
help.description: This option allows you to define how many mobs you want to summon at once. The maximum limit is 20 mobs per summon.

help.title: Help - Mob Position
help.description: This option lets you define where the mob will appear. You can choose between relative position (relative to the player) or absolute position (world coordinates). Enter X and Y values to determine the exact spawn point.

help.title: Help - Equipped Item
help.description: This option allows you to choose the item the mob will hold in its hand. The selected item will appear in the mob's hand when summoned.

help.title: Help - Mob Health
help.description: This option lets you set how much health the mob will have when it appears. The value should be between 1 and 1000 health points.

help.title: Help - Default Loot
help.description: This option allows you to enable or disable the mob's default loot. When enabled, the mob will drop its default configured items on death.

help.title: Help - Loot Tags
help.description: Loot tags control special behaviors when the mob dies, such as the chance to drop rare items.

helpTexts.bonus: Fortune bonus to apply to drops.
helpTexts.onFire: When enabled the drop will be generated from mobs that are on fire.
helpTexts.isBaby: Whether the drop applies only to baby variants.
helpTexts.variant: Mob variant this drop applies to.
helpTexts.isSheared: Applies only if mob is sheared (sheep).
helpTexts.color: Color filter for the drop (if applicable).
helpTexts.item_name: Custom name to assign to the item.
helpTexts.item_type: Type of item associated with the drop.
helpTexts.item_canPlaceOn: Blocks this item can be placed on.
helpTexts.item_showParticles: Toggle to remove item particles (disabled = no particles).
helpTexts.item_command: Custom command applied to the item.
helpTexts.item_uses: Number of uses for the item.
helpTexts.item_anvilUses: Anvil uses (repair cost) for the item.

help.title: Help - Mob Armor
help.description: This option lets you equip the mob with different pieces of armor. You can choose helmet, chestplate, leggings and boots of various materials.

help.title: Help - Aggressiveness
help.description: This option lets you define the mob's aggressive behavior. Hostile will attack players, Neutral will only attack if provoked, and Passive will never attack.

help.title: Help - Skin ID
help.description: Enter the numeric ID of the skin you want to assign to the mob. Only numbers are allowed (e.g. 76198). In the command it will be added as `skin:76198`.

help.title: Help - Charged Creeper
help.description: Enable this option to turn the creeper into a charged variant. The command will include `charged:1` when enabled.

baby.title: Baby
baby.description: Configure how the mob should appear in its baby variant. Choose 'Always' for baby:true or 'Time' to specify a number to appear as baby:N in the command.

help.title: Help - Baby
help.description: Set whether the mob should be spawned as a baby. 'Always' sets baby:true. 'Time' allows entering a numeric value that will be used as baby:N in the generated command.
